item.description:
Buy one or more of Herb's books - the new Herb's Tips for Living or The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram. Fine to come if you buy a book or not! Bring friends! Come celebrate anything you want to celebrate as well as Herb's 33rd anniversary of living in Boston. Share stories about your living in Boston and where else you have lived.

7:30-10:30, free, vegetarian potluck

 

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, likes to network people. He's a relationship therapist and coach. Enneagram teacher and staff and team development trainer in groups and organizations.

www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Book Signing Party & Celebrate Herb's 33rd Anniversary in Boston
